lead_paragraph: INDICTMENT AGAINST ALMIRA BAZELY, FOR MURDER.--On Saturday, last, in the Supreme Court, Almira Bazely was arraigned upon an indictment by the Grand Jury, charging her with the willful murder of her half brother, John Bazely, an infant of tender age, by administering arsenic in its food. She is a girl about 14 years of age, and of rather a downcast look. But when called upon by the clerk to step forward and hold up her
